T02D1630:232a-1: ma h'a m'a y'a s'a dha nam mandala bi dhi /
T02D1630:232a-3: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1630:232a-4: gyi cho ga / dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la
T02D1630:232b-0: phyag 'tshal lo // 'phags pa spyan ras @232b gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1630:232b-1: 'jig dus chu 'dzin mdog can brgyad phyed zhal //
T02D1630:232b-2: phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis bdud kyi snying gar mnan //
T02D1630:232b-3: rang rig 'od kyis 'khril cing bde gang ba'i //
T02D1630:232b-4: bde gshegs kun gtso rdo rje 'dzin par 'dud //
T02D1630:232b-5: skye bo rtog pa'i dba' rlabs g-yengs pa yis //
T02D1630:232b-6: gzhung mang blta bar mi nus rnams kyi phyir //
T02D1630:232b-7: lung dang man ngag rigs pas gzhung bkod de //
T02D1630:232b-8: mdor bsdus dran pa tsam zhig bri bar bya //
T02D1630:232b-9: de la re zhig dang po slob ma dbang bskur ba'i snod dang skal bar ldan pa ni //
T02D1630:232b-11: 'jam zhing snyan smra snying rjer ldan //
T02D1630:232b-12: dge ba'i las la mngon par brtson //
T02D1630:232b-13: theg pa che la lhag par dad //
T02D1630:232b-14: rgyun du bla ma la gus shing //
T02D1630:232b-15: sbyin dang gtong la mngon dga' ba //
T02D1630:232b-16: slob ma de ni yongs su gzung //
T02D1630:232b-17: de bas na mtshan nyid de lta bu dang ldan
T02D1630:232b-18: pa'i slob mas dbang nod pa'i 'os su gyur pa'i
T02D1630:232b-19: bla ma la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D1630:232b-21: brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan //
T02D1630:232b-22: bzod ldan drang zhing g-yo sgyu med //
T02D1630:232b-23: gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor ba mkhas //
T02D1630:232b-24: des ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D1630:232b-25: de bas na de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan
T02D1630:232b-26: pa'i slob dpon la lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar
T02D1630:232b-27: du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1630:232b-29: gal te khyod kyis dkyil 'khor gyi rdzas dang /
T02D1630:232b-30: yo byad 'di dang 'di la sogs pa 'byor ram mi 'byor zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02D1630:232b-31: de nas de dag 'byor par khas len na de'i
T02D1630:232b-32: tshe gnad ba byin la slob ma blang zhing bsrung
T02D1630:232b-33: bar bya ste / slob ma'i rkang mthil du yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor /
T02D1630:232b-34: gsang bar ram las me'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1630:232b-35: snying gar las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdig pa'i ngo bo pam mam kam nag po gcig bsams la /
T02D1630:232b-36: de nas rlung gis me sbar bas snying ga'i kam bsregs te /
T02D1630:232b-37: las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba thams cad sbyangs par bsams nas /
T02D1630:232b-38: slob ma'i gnas gsum du 'bru gsum bkod la 'khor
T02D1630:232b-39: lo can gyi sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs
T02D1630:232b-40: pa bzlas te bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1630:232b-41: de nas slob dpon gyis bsnyen pa la 'jug ste /
T02D1630:233a-0: @233a * // gtor ma la sogs pa bshams te /
T02D1630:233a-1: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bltas la mchod pa la sogs pa bya /
T02D1630:233a-2: de nas lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1630:233a-3: 'khor lo can gyi 'bum phrag gcig bzlas la //
T02D1630:233a-4: lha mo rnams kyi ni khri phrag re bzlas so //
T02D1630:233a-5: de nas yang mchod pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D1630:233a-6: grogs po bzang po dag dang bcas pas brtag cing sbyang bar bya ste /
T02D1630:233a-8: gtsug lag khang dang tshong dus dang //
T02D1630:233a-9: ldum ra grong ngam grong khyer gyi //
T02D1630:233a-10: shar dang byang gi sa yi char //
T02D1630:233a-11: mnyam par gzhag cing gzung bar bya //
T02D1630:233a-12: de bas na de dag tu brtag pa'am /
T02D1630:233a-14: nags tshal la sogs pa gang dang gang du yid du 'ong ba'i gnas der sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1630:233a-18: phyi'i sbyang pa la yang gnyis te /
T02D1630:233a-19: las kyi bya bas sbyang ba dang /
T02D1630:233a-20: zhi ba'i thab khung du mi rus kyi phye ma
T02D1630:233a-21: la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg byas la nye bar zhi
T02D1630:233a-22: bar bya'o // de la bya bas sbyang ba ni /
T02D1630:233a-24: pus nub tsam du brkos nas ni //
T02D1630:233a-25: sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya //
T02D1630:233a-26: gal te lhag par gyur na ni //
T02D1630:233a-27: dngos grub yod par ston pa yin //
T02D1630:233a-28: de bas na pus nub tsam du brkos la /
T02D1630:233a-29: sa'i skyon rnams bsal nas de nyid kyis legs par bkang ste gzhung dang mthun par bya'o //
T02D1630:233a-30: de nas ni chu'i ltas brtag par bya ste /
T02D1630:233a-32: mtho gang zlum po brkos nas ni //
T02D1630:233a-33: ba chus byug la chu yis dgang //
T02D1630:233a-34: ma yengs sems kyis shar phyin la //
T02D1630:233a-35: slar log pas ni brtag par bya //
T02D1630:233a-36: de bas na chu'i ltas rab 'bring gsum du bltas la /
T02D1630:233a-37: de nas dri zhim po dang bcas pa'i sas khung
T02D1630:233a-38: bu legs par bkang nas rin po che lnga dang
T02D1630:233a-39: / 'bru sna lnga sa'i nang du bcug la legs par bcug pa'i rdzas lngas byug cing /
T02D1630:233a-40: nye 'khor du me tog sil ma bkram pa dang /
T02D1630:233a-41: phyogs mtshams su ba dan dang /
T02D1630:233a-42: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa btsugs la /
T02D1630:233a-43: las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i chus gtor ba ni bya bas spyad ba'o //
T02D1630:233b-1: nang la gzhol ba'i sems kyis chos nyid kyi sngags bzlas te stong nyid du bsgoms la /
T02D1630:233b-2: de'i ngang las yi ge h'um las rdo rje'i sa gzhir bsgoms nas /
T02D1630:233b-3: aom me di n'i badzr'i bha wa badzra bandha h'um /
T02D1630:233b-4: zhes pas byin gyis brlab po //
T02D1630:233b-7: sa'i dbus su lha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas snying rje chen po dmigs te /
T02D1630:233b-8: lag pa sa la brdabs pas sa gas pa'i ser
T02D1630:233b-9: ga nas sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser po zhi
T02D1630:233b-10: ba'i rang bzhin can phyag gnyis kyis bum pa 'dzin
T02D1630:233b-12: mchod pa dang gtor ma phul te /
T02D1630:233b-13: dpal ldan rdo rje he ru kas //
T02D1630:233b-14: mchod cing sna tshogs rin chen 'dzin //
T02D1630:233b-15: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02D1630:233b-17: zhes pas sa blangs la de nas gsol ba btab ste /
T02D1630:233b-18: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1630:233b-19: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi //
T02D1630:233b-20: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D1630:233b-21: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02D1630:233b-22: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02D1630:233b-23: ji ltar bdud kyi stobs bcom pa //
T02D1630:233b-24: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni //
T02D1630:233b-25: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D1630:233b-26: zhes brjod la de nyid du thim par bsam mo //
T02D1630:233b-28: slob dpon sa'i dbus su 'dug ste ;
T02D1630:233b-30: cod pan la sogs pas brgyan nas /
T02D1630:233b-31: rdo rje dril bu bzung ste /
T02D1630:233b-32: dpal he ru ka'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas
T02D1630:233b-33: slob ma bzhi yang rgyan chas dang rdo rje dril
T02D1630:233b-34: bu 'dzin pas rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i
T02D1630:233b-35: lha mo bzhir bsgoms la phyogs bzhi nas gsol ba
T02D1630:233b-36: gdab ste / de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02D1630:233b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D1630:233b-38: rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i //
T02D1630:233b-39: dkyil 'khor gtso bos bshad du gsol //
T02D1630:233b-40: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02D1630:233b-41: mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs //
T02D1630:233b-42: kun du bzang po sku yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02D1630:233b-43: zhi ba'i chos mchog las byung ba'i //
T02D1630:233b-44: ye shes sbyong ba rnam sbyong ba //
T02D1630:233b-45: kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam ba bshad du gsol //
T02D1630:233b-46: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
T02D1630:233b-47: rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med //
T02D1630:234a-0: kun du bzang po thugs kyi mchog / dkyil @234a * //
T02D1630:234a-2: de nas bdag lha'i nga rgyal bsgyings pa dang bcas
T02D1630:234a-3: par mig g-yas par aa las zla ba mig g-yon
T02D1630:234a-4: par ta las nyi ma bsams te /
T02D1630:234a-5: rkang mthil du h'um las sna tshogs rdo rje gdengs pa bsgoms la /
T02D1630:234a-6: dbang ldan du song la rdo rje gsor te /
T02D1630:234a-8: deng slob dpon ngas sa phyogs 'dir slob ma'i don du las 'di rtsom gyis /
T02D1630:234a-15: srin po la sogs pa gang dag gnas pa'i sa
T02D1630:234a-16: bdag rnams myur du deng shig /'di ltar dpal he
T02D1630:234a-17: ru ka'i bka' thos nas myur ba nyid du song
T02D1630:234a-18: shig / gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag la
T02D1630:234a-20: kha tv'am ga 'dis mgo bo tshal pa brgyar dgas par bya'o zhes lan gsum brjod nas /
T02D1630:234a-21: de nas yang rdo rje gsor nas /
T02D1630:234a-22: h'um lus ngag sems dang ldan pa yi //
T02D1630:234a-23: bgegs kyi tshogs kun nga la nyon nga ni dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs //
T02D1630:234a-24: srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas //
T02D1630:234a-25: rdo rje 'bar ba'i kha tv'am gas //
T02D1630:234a-26: sku gsung las byung dags par bya //
T02D1630:234a-27: gal te dam tshig las 'das na //
T02D1630:234a-29: ces brjod la g-yas brkyang dang /
T02D1630:234a-30: g-yon brkyang la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'gros kyis kun du bskor zhing bcags la //
T02D1630:234a-31: seng ldeng gi phur pa sor brgyad pa la tsandan dmar pos bskus te /
T02D1630:234a-32: me tog dmar po btags pa dgu dbus dang /
T02D1630:234a-33: phyogs mtshams dgur btab la lha la phyag bya'o //
T02D1630:234a-34: sa bsrung ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su
T02D1630:234a-35: gnas pa bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D1630:234a-36: ra ba dang / dra ba dang sa gzhi la sogs pa srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgoms la /
T02D1630:234a-37: snying gnas khro bo bgegs mthar byed stod khro bo la smad phur bu'i dbyibs can phyung ste /
T02D1630:234a-38: aom gha gha / gh'a ta ya /
T02D1630:234a-44: h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya ;
T02D1630:234a-45: badzra dha rod a'adzny'a p'a ya ti /
T02D1630:234a-48: badzra k'i la ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1630:234a-49: ces pas bgegs rnams la phur bus btab ste /
T02D1630:234a-50: aom raksha raksha zhes pa dang /
T02D1630:234a-52: de nas lha sta gon la gnas pa ni /
T02D1630:234a-53: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri zhim po'i chus
T02D1630:234b-0: @234b dbus su sor bcu pa gru bzhir byugs la
T02D1630:234b-1: / phyogs bzhir lha mo rnams kyi gnas su sor drug pa zlum po byas te /
T02D1630:234b-2: so sor me tog re re bzhag ste /
T02D1630:234b-3: snying ga'i sa bon gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo
T02D1630:234b-4: nam mkha' la bkug la mchod pa'i khyad par kun
T02D1630:234b-5: gyis mchod nas de'i rjes la bstod pa bya ste
T02D1630:234b-6: / mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa che /
T02D1630:234b-7: sngags kyi me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D1630:234b-8: sha chen rtag tu gsol mdzad pa'i //
T02D1630:234b-9: he ru ka la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1630:234b-10: rnam par snang mdzad rab tu dag / rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che //
T02D1630:234b-11: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog / sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro phyag 'chal bstod//
T02D1630:234b-12: mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che //
T02D1630:234b-13: rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po //
T02D1630:234b-14: rdo rje mchog gsum dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02D1630:234b-16: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02D1630:234b-17: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02D1630:234b-18: dngos nyid dag pas gos pa med //
T02D1630:234b-20: rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che //
T02D1630:234b-21: mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1630:234b-22: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
T02D1630:234b-24: rdo rje dag pa gdon mi za //
T02D1630:234b-25: bsam pa thams cad rab rdzogs byed //
T02D1630:234b-26: sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid las byung //
T02D1630:234b-29: de nas bskor ba bya la bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i bdug sbos lag tu thogs te /
T02D1630:234b-30: pus mo g-yas ba'i lha nga sa la btsugs te 'di skad gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D1630:234b-31: he ru ka dpal dpa' bo'i mchog / rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal 'dud//
T02D1630:234b-32: khyed rnams la ni mchod pa dang //
T02D1630:234b-33: slob ma rnams la brtse bya'i phyir //
T02D1630:234b-34: mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid kyis //
T02D1630:234b-36: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la //
T02D1630:234b-37: de bas gnang ba mdzad par 'os //
T02D1630:234b-38: gro ba'i 'khor lo'i don mdzad pa'i //
T02D1630:234b-39: sangs rgyas mgon po brtser ldan pa'i //
T02D1630:234b-40: byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang //
T02D1630:234b-41: sngags kyi lha gzhan gang lags dang //
T02D1630:234b-42: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02D1630:234b-43: gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang //
T02D1630:234b-44: gang dag rdo rje'i spyan mnga' ba //
T02D1630:234b-45: sems can bstan la mngon dga' rnams //
T02D1630:235a-2: rdo rje che ge mo bdag gis //
T02D1630:235a-3: he ru ka 'byung dkyil 'khor mchog / yo byad ci 'byor bdag gis //
T02D1630:235a-4: 'gro ba dag cing bdag bsgrubs na //
T02D1630:235a-5: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
T02D1630:235a-6: thugs rjes thugs dpag mdzad nas kyang //
T02D1630:235a-7: dkyil 'khor bar bcas thams cad kyis //
T02D1630:235a-8: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1630:235a-9: zhes lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa ni lha sta gon la gnas pa'o //
T02D1630:235a-10: de nas las kyi bum pa sta go na la gnas pa ni //
T02D1630:235a-11: bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa gcig la dri zhim pos byug ste /
T02D1630:235a-12: las thams cad pa'i mtshan ma bris la de nyid
T02D1630:235a-13: kyi gsang sngags bzlas pa'i yungs kar gyis brdeg cing
T02D1630:235a-17: rin po che rnams stsal te /
T02D1630:235a-18: kha rgyan dang mgul chings dang phreng ba la sogs
T02D1630:235a-19: pas brgyan la de nas stong pa nyid du bsgom
T02D1630:235a-20: / de'i ngang las pam las padma /
T02D1630:235a-21: der bam las bum pa de'i nang du padma la gnas pa'i khro bo bskyed la /
T02D1630:235a-22: snying ga'i sa bon las ye shes kyi khro bo bkug ste /
T02D1630:235a-24: gtor ma gtod la kha rgyan gyi steng du rdo rje bzhag la /
T02D1630:235a-25: las thams cad pa'i sngags 'bru gsum dang spel ba bzlas la /
T02D1630:235a-26: bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal pos bdag cag gi
T02D1630:235a-27: las 'di ma grub pa'i bar du bgegs thams cad
T02D1630:235a-28: bzlog cig ces brjod la sgo phyogs su bzhag go
T02D1630:235a-29: // de nas slob ma sta gon la gnas pa ni /
T02D1630:235a-30: sngar bstan pa ltar shin tu brtags pa'i slob ma khrus byas la /
T02D1630:235a-31: gos sar pa bgos nas mandala byas te /
T02D1630:235a-32: lag na me tog dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1630:235a-33: drung du bzhag ste bus mo btsugs te thal mo
T02D1630:235a-35: slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod de /
T02D1630:235a-36: sngags kyi dngos grub don gnyer gang //
T02D1630:235a-38: bsod nams 'dod pas de las gzhan //
T02D1630:235a-39: gang dga' 'jig rten pha rol gnyer //
T02D1630:235a-40: dad pa chen por ldan pa dag /'jig rten pha rol la dmigs nas //
T02D1630:235a-41: blo ldan dkyil 'khor gzhug bya ste /
T02D1630:235b-2: 'jig rten pha rol la dmigs na //
T02D1630:235b-5: de nas slob mas 'di skad ces gsol ba gdab ste /
T02D1630:235b-7: dpa' chen khyed bdag ston pa ste //
T02D1630:235b-8: slob dpon chen po dgongs su gsol //
T02D1630:235b-9: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D1630:235b-10: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D1630:235b-11: dam tshig 'di nyid bdag la stsol //
T02D1630:235b-12: bdag la byang chub sems kyang stsol //
T02D1630:235b-13: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D1630:235b-14: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D1630:235b-15: thar ba chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D1630:235b-16: mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02D1630:235b-17: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D1630:235b-18: bu tshur shog cig theg chen po'i //
T02D1630:235b-19: snod ni tshul chen khyod yin pas //
T02D1630:235b-20: sngags kyi spyod tshul cho ga rnams //
T02D1630:235b-21: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02D1630:235b-22: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che //
T02D1630:235b-23: dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1630:235b-24: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa kun //
T02D1630:235b-25: de dag gis ni gsang sngags kyi //
T02D1630:235b-27: dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du //
T02D1630:235b-28: thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med brnyes //
T02D1630:235b-29: sh'akya seng sogs mchog gis kyang //
T02D1630:235b-30: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pa //
T02D1630:235b-31: drag po chen po bdud kyi sde //
T02D1630:235b-32: dpung chen dag kyang des bcom nas //
T02D1630:235b-33: 'jig rten mthun par gshegs nas su //
T02D1630:235b-35: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02D1630:235b-36: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / ces brjod
T02D1630:235b-37: la de nas slob mas sems bskyed cing sdom pa
T02D1630:235b-38: bzung ste / dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchig //
T02D1630:235b-39: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D1630:235b-40: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D1630:235b-41: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D1630:235b-42: de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas /
T02D1630:235b-47: zhes pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1630:235b-48: de nas khu tshur g-yas pas rdo rje bzung ste /
T02D1630:236a-0: langs nas tsandan gyi chu dang bcas bas spyi bo la sogs pa'i gnas @236a * //
T02D1630:236a-1: gsum du yi ge 'bru gsum gyis brjod cing nye reg bya'o //
T02D1630:236a-2: de nas sngags dang bcas pas spyi bor me tog dang /
T02D1630:236a-7: de nas so shing aa shvattha la sogs pa las
T02D1630:236a-8: byung ba gas chag med cing drang po sor bcu
T02D1630:236a-9: gnyis pa'i tshad la rtse mo'i phyogs su me tog
T02D1630:236a-10: dang bcas pa la rtsa ba'i sngags mngon par bzlas
T02D1630:236a-11: te byin la rtse mo me tog dang bcas pa
T02D1630:236a-12: 'chos te / ba lang gi ko ba tsam gyis mandala byug ste /
T02D1630:236a-13: kha shar tu bltas la drang por dor ro //
T02D1630:236a-14: rtse mo'i phyogs gang du bstan pa la las dang dngos grub kyi ltas brtag par bya'o //
T02D1630:236a-16: aom hr'i:bi shuddha:sarbba dha rm'a:p'a pham ni shtsa sya sam
T02D1630:236a-17: sho dha ya sarba bi kal b'an aa ba na
T02D1630:236a-18: ya h'um / zhes pas mngon par bsngags la lan gsum du blud do //
T02D1630:236a-19: de nas yi ge dh'i:bzlas pa'i ku sha sngas su byin la ha bzlas pa ni /
T02D1630:236a-21: de nas yang h'um bzlas pa'i skud pa mdud pa gsum dang ldan ba dpung par gdags so //
T02D1630:236a-22: de nas spro ba bskyed cing chos bshad de /
T02D1630:236a-23: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag / au dumb'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02D1630:236a-24: brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung srid //
T02D1630:236a-25: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba //
T02D1630:236a-26: de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste //
T02D1630:236a-27: gang gis sems can mnyam med don //
T02D1630:236a-28: bla med byed par nus pa yin //
T02D1630:236a-29: bskal pa bye ba du ma ru //
T02D1630:236a-30: sngon du sdig pa byas pa gang //
T02D1630:236a-31: dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong ma thag / de dag zad par 'gyur yin na //
T02D1630:236a-32: grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i //
T02D1630:236a-33: tshul gnas pa la smos ci dgos //
T02D1630:236a-34: skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni //
T02D1630:236a-36: gang gis spyod pa mchog 'di la //
T02D1630:236a-37: blo gros shin tu dri med na //
T02D1630:236a-38: sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung ba yi //
T02D1630:236a-40: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02D1630:236a-41: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
T02D1630:236a-42: gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa'i //
T02D1630:236a-43: bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyis //
T02D1630:236a-44: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
T02D1630:236a-45: yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa //
T02D1630:236a-46: de phyir khyed rnams theg chen gyi //
T02D1630:236b-1: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02D1630:236b-2: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02D1630:236b-3: khyed rnams der ni dong bas na //
T02D1630:236b-4: rang byung skal ba chen po la //
T02D1630:236b-5: 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T02D1630:236b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D1630:236b-8: de'i rjes la slob ma rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsrungs
T02D1630:236b-9: la thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad brjod de sngom
T02D1630:236b-11: mi ldog 'khor lo'i dbang bskur ba //
T02D1630:236b-12: mgon pos bdag la stsal nas kyang //
T02D1630:236b-13: 'khor lo lha yi de nyid dang //
T02D1630:236b-14: slob dpon phrin las yongs su gsungs //
T02D1630:236b-15: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dang //
T02D1630:236b-16: gsang ba'i sdom pa bla med pa bsrungs //
T02D1630:236b-17: zhes zhus la sdom pa dpog go //
T02D1630:236b-18: de nas rmi lam du ci mthong ba nga la smros shig ces bsgo la //
T02D1630:236b-19: rang rang gi lha la lhag par mos pas nyal la rmi lam brtag go //
T02D1630:236b-20: de nas slob dpon gyis nang du zhugs te slob
T02D1630:236b-21: ma bsrung ba'i phyir 'khor lo can gyi sngags bzlas
T02D1630:236b-23: nang par slob ma bos la rmi lam dris la
T02D1630:236b-24: mi dge ba'i ltas mthong na rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas
T02D1630:236b-25: pas bsrung ngo // slob ma sta gon la gnas pa'o //
T02D1630:236b-26: de nas dkyil 'khor bri zhing thig ga gdab par bya ste /
T02D1630:236b-28: ras bal la sogs legs bkal ba'i //
T02D1630:236b-29: gsar zhing sbom phra 'jur mdud med //
T02D1630:236b-31: mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya //
T02D1630:236b-32: de bas na las thams cad pa'i skud pas dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du thig gdab ste /
T02D1630:236b-34: dang por tshangs thig gnyis btab nas //
T02D1630:236b-35: de 'og mtshams kyi thig gnyis bri //
T02D1630:236b-36: de nas dkyil 'khor tshad dang ni //
T02D1630:236b-37: mthun pa gru bzhir gdab par bya //
T02D1630:236b-38: phyogs dang mtshams kyi thig gi bar //
T02D1630:236b-39: mnyam por cha mnyam gdab par bya //
T02D1630:236b-40: de nas slob dpon dbus 'dug la //
T02D1630:236b-41: dbus su phur bus btab nas ni //
T02D1630:236b-42: thig skud gnyis bltab phur la gdab //
T02D1630:236b-43: de 'og snying po'i pho brang ni //
T02D1630:236b-44: ji tsam rigs pa'i zlum por bskor //
T02D1630:236b-45: de nas dbang ldan phyogs nas ni //
T02D1630:236b-46: slob mas rim pa gnyis su bskor //
T02D1630:236b-47: rdo rje ra ba me rir bcas //
T02D1630:236b-48: zlum po gnyis su bskor byas pas //
T02D1630:236b-49: dbus su sna tshogs pad 'dab brgyad //
T02D1630:236b-50: rdo rje phreng dang bcas par 'gyur //
T02D1630:237a-1: lnga'i rang bzhin gyi tshon lnga'i kha dog skud pa snod so sor bzhag la //
T02D1630:237a-2: bdag nyid dpal he ru ka'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D1630:237a-3: gnas pas mig gnyis su ta dang ma las nyi
T02D1630:237a-4: ma dang zla ba bsams la 'bar ba'i blta bas
T02D1630:237a-5: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' la bkug ste der dgug pa dang /
T02D1630:237a-6: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas nas bdud rtsi lngas gtor ro //
T02D1630:237a-8: rab byung myur du bskul ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'gugs byed pa //
T02D1630:237a-9: 'bar ba'i lta ba zhes bya ste /
T02D1630:237a-10: 'gro ba thams cad dgug par byed //
T02D1630:237a-12: de nas aom aa bha ga w'an sha shva sva
T02D1630:237a-13: te su tam pra yatstsha sva tsakra s'u tra n'a
T02D1630:237a-14: ya h'um zhes brjod pas nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i
T02D1630:237a-15: dkyil 'khor las ye shes kyi skud pa blangs te
T02D1630:237a-17: phan tshun rjes su rdzogs pa ste //
T02D1630:237a-18: chos kun phan tshun rjes su 'gro //
T02D1630:237a-19: chos rnams thams cad rjes su yang //
T02D1630:237a-20: 'gro bar phan tshun rjes su brjod //
T02D1630:237a-21: ces brjod la slob ma rdo rje mkha' 'gror bsgoms pa dang /
T02D1630:237a-22: gnyis kyis gcig tu bsgril te /
T02D1630:237a-23: aom aa n+yo n+y'a nu ga ta sarbba dharm'a:a'a tyanta
T02D1630:237a-24: aa nu pra bishta sarba rm'a h'um zhes brjod cing
T02D1630:237a-26: de nas bdag nyid nub phyogs su gnas la //
T02D1630:237a-27: rdo rje la dkris pa'i skud pa khu tshur g-yon pas bzung ste /
T02D1630:237a-28: shar phyogs na gnas pa'i slob ma la /
T02D1630:237a-29: dza:dza:dza:zhes pas gtang nas tshangs thig dang po btab ste /
T02D1630:237a-30: aom badzra s'u tra sa ma ya m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02D1630:237a-31: sems can don byed dus su ni //
T02D1630:237a-32: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1630:237a-33: de dag 'dir gshegs bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1630:237a-34: thig skud sgra yis bskul bar bya //
T02D1630:237a-35: zhes pa brjod la gdab po //
T02D1630:237a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul te byon par 'gyur ro //
T02D1630:237a-37: de nas bskor phyogs su song ste /
T02D1630:237a-38: gshin rje'i phyogs su gnas la /
T02D1630:237a-39: byang phyogs na gnas pa'i slob ma dang /
T02D1630:237a-40: tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab bo //
T02D1630:237a-41: de bzhin du sa la yang gdab po //
T02D1630:237a-42: de nas yang me'i mtshams su song ste /
T02D1630:237a-43: dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa dang /
T02D1630:237a-44: shar phyogs kyi thig gdab la /
T02D1630:237a-45: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang sbyar la thig ji
T02D1630:237a-46: ltar gnas pa de bzhin du nam mkha' dang sa
T02D1630:237b-1: de nas aom badzra mu:zhes pas ye shes kyi skud pa gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1630:237b-2: de nas tshon bris te gser la sogs pa'i tshon rtsi lnga'am /
T02D1630:237b-3: ma 'byor na 'bras phye la sogs pa'i phye ma
T02D1630:237b-4: zhib tu btags te dri zhim pos bdugs la so
T02D1630:237b-5: sor thod pa'i snod du bzhag ste /
T02D1630:237b-6: thig gi skabs dang 'dra bar 'bar ba'i blta bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug la /
T02D1630:237b-7: kha don ji lta ba bzhin du bstim ste /
T02D1630:237b-8: aom badzra tsitra sa ma ye h'um zhes brjod cing mngon par bsngags la /
T02D1630:237b-9: chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag / sems can khams ni sgrol byed pa'i //
T02D1630:237b-10: he ru ka dpal rgyal chen gyi //
T02D1630:237b-11: dkyil 'khor snying po bri bar bya //
T02D1630:237b-12: zhes brjod nas lag pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis
T02D1630:237b-13: tshon rtsi rnams so sor bzung la dbang ldan gyi
T02D1630:237b-15: ri mo phan tshun du ma 'byar pa dang ya yo med par g-yas skor du bri'o //
T02D1630:237b-16: de'i rim pa ni nang rol du nag po'o //
T02D1630:237b-17: de'i phyi rol du dkar po'o //
T02D1630:237b-21: de nas ri mo lnga po cung zad cig bris
T02D1630:237b-22: la kham phor la sogs pas bkab la phyi nas
T02D1630:237b-24: phyi nas slob ma rnams kyis ci bder bri'o //
T02D1630:237b-25: de nas rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni dkar po la /
T02D1630:237b-26: de'i phyi rol gyi 'dab ma brgyad ni dmar po'o //
T02D1630:237b-27: de'i rdo rje'i phreng ba ni nag po'o //
T02D1630:237b-29: de'i phyi rol rdo rjer ba dang /
T02D1630:237b-31: dbus kyi snying po'i pho brang la /
T02D1630:237b-32: nyi ma la gnas pa'i thod pa'am /
T02D1630:237b-34: shar du nyi ma'i steng du rdo rje'o //
T02D1630:237b-35: lho ru nyi ma'i steng du rin po che'i lcug ma'o //
T02D1630:237b-36: nub tu nyi ma'i steng du padma'o //
T02D1630:237b-37: byang du nyi ma'i steng du ral gri'o //
T02D1630:237b-38: phyi rol gyi dur khrod brgyad rnams ni shing lo
T02D1630:237b-39: la gnas pa'i phyogs skyong gi gdan gyi mgo bri'o
T02D1630:237b-41: me 'od ni ci rigs par bri'o //
T02D1630:237b-43: bdag nyid khro bo las thams cad pa'i skur bsgoms la /
T02D1630:237b-44: rdo rje gsor dril bu gsil te lan gsum bskor la /
T02D1630:238a-0: h'um zhes brjod cing g-yas brkyang la sogs pa'i lus kyi sbyor @238a * //
T02D1630:238a-2: khro bo'i phreng sngags bzlas pa'i ngag gi sbyor ba dang /
T02D1630:238a-3: stong pa nyid du bsgom pa'i sems kyi sbyor bas bgegs bsal lo //
T02D1630:238a-4: de nas bum pa gzhung dang mthun pa rtsa ba
T02D1630:238a-5: nag po la sogs pa'i skyon med pa'i bum pa
T02D1630:238a-6: lnga la lha so so'i mtshan ma bris nas /
T02D1630:238a-7: gong du smos pa'i cho gas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1630:238a-8: dbus kyi bum par dpal he ru ka yab yum bskyed /
T02D1630:238a-9: sa bon gyi 'od kyis ye shes kyi lha bkug ste /
T02D1630:238a-10: me tog la sogs pas mchod cing bstod nas /
T02D1630:238a-11: rdo rje kha rgyan gyi steng du bzhag la /
T02D1630:238a-12: rtsa ba'i sngags 'bru gsum dang bcas pa brgya rtsa
T02D1630:238a-13: brgyad bzlas nas de nas yab yum 'od du zhu
T02D1630:238a-14: ste ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chur gyur par bsam
T02D1630:238a-15: mo // de bzhin du bum pa bzhi yang rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D1630:238a-16: gzhan yang yon chab la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams 'bru gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D1630:238a-17: gdan dang gos kyis dgab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1630:238a-18: de nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1630:238a-19: phyi rim du ba'i lcibs byugs la me tog sil
T02D1630:238a-20: ma bkram nas bla re dang /
T02D1630:238a-21: rgyal mtshan la sogs pa bre bum pa kun nas so sor bzhag ste /
T02D1630:238a-22: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dbus su gzhag pa'am /
T02D1630:238a-23: yang na shar phyogs kyi sgo'i nang du bzhag go //
T02D1630:238a-24: bum pa kun las chu cung zad bsdus te /
T02D1630:238a-25: padma'i snod du blugs la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du gzhag go //
T02D1630:238a-26: de nas slob dbon bdag nyid khrus byas te /
T02D1630:238a-27: rgyan chas dang ldan par byas la nang du zhugs nas stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D1630:238a-28: rim pa 'dis dkyil 'khor sprul par bya ste /
T02D1630:238a-29: lo bcu gnyis pa la sogs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i bu mo'am /
T02D1630:238a-30: yang na 'od kyi rig ma snying ga nas phyung la /
T02D1630:238a-31: yab yum gnyis lha'i skur bsgoms nas gsang gnas gnyis
T02D1630:238a-32: byin gyis brlabs te snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba'i
T02D1630:238a-33: sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste bdag
T02D1630:238a-34: la bcug nas dkyil 'khor lo'i tshul du nam mkha'
T02D1630:238a-35: la khyab par spros nas slar bsdus te /
T02D1630:238a-36: ye shes kyi lha dang 'dres nas so sor bzhugs pa'am /
T02D1630:238b-0: yang na stong pa nyid @238b du bsgoms pa'i ngang las h'um gi snang ba las rab dang /
T02D1630:238b-2: sa gzhi yang bsgoms la de'i nang du sna tshogs padma bsams te /
T02D1630:238b-3: de'i rjes la dbus dang phyogs bzhir nyi ma'i steng du thig le phra mo re re bsgom /
T02D1630:238b-4: de nas shar phyogs kyi thig le las rdo rje'i rigs dpag tu med pa spros te /
T02D1630:238b-5: ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rigs thams cad bsdus nas
T02D1630:238b-6: shar phyogs kyi thig ler thim pas rdo rje mkha'
T02D1630:238b-8: de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma gsum yang bskyed do //
T02D1630:238b-9: de nas dbus kyi thig le las rigs lnga char
T02D1630:238b-10: gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs
T02D1630:238b-11: pa spros / slar bsdus te dbus kyi thig le la thim pas /
T02D1630:238b-12: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pa'i dpal he ru kar bskyed la /
T02D1630:238b-13: de yang yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba'i
T02D1630:238b-14: ngo bor 'od du zhu ste 'od kyi gong bur
T02D1630:238b-15: gnas pa la / phyogs bzhi'i lha mo bzhi'i glus
T02D1630:238b-16: bskul bas yab yum dus gcig tu skur bzhengs par
T02D1630:238b-17: gnas pa la / bsgom mo // de ltar ye
T02D1630:238b-18: shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i lha'i 'khor lo
T02D1630:238b-19: gnas pa la / bsgom mo // sprul nas /
T02D1630:238b-20: de nas phyi'i mchod pa yon chab la sogs pa
T02D1630:238b-21: rol mo'i bar gyis mchod do //
T02D1630:238b-22: nang gi mchod pa ni bdud rtsi myang ba nas
T02D1630:238b-23: tshogs kyi mchod pa'o / gsang ba'i mchod pa ni
T02D1630:238b-24: dbang po gnyis kyi bde ba'o //
T02D1630:238b-25: bla na med pa'i mchod pa ni gnyis su med pa'i bsgom pa'o //
T02D1630:238b-26: de nas sngar smos pa'i bstod pas bstod nas /
T02D1630:238b-27: lha rnams kyi sngags dang 'bru gsum dang spel ba ci nus pa bzlas la /
T02D1630:238b-28: yang phyi nang gi mchod pas mchod nas /
T02D1630:238b-29: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma rgya chen po gtong ngo //
T02D1630:238b-30: de nas nang du zhugs te /
T02D1630:238b-31: bdag nyid dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing dbang nod pa'i phyir /
T02D1630:238b-32: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
T02D1630:238b-33: mchod chen ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin //
T02D1630:238b-34: bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du //
T02D1630:238b-35: nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol //
T02D1630:238b-36: zhes lha la gsol ba btab la /
T02D1630:238b-37: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag pos bdag la gnang
T02D1630:238b-38: ba byin nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa nas rjes
T02D1630:238b-39: su gnang ba'i bar du dbang bskur bar bsgom mo
T02D1630:238b-40: // de nas dam tshig gi glus bstod de /
T02D1630:238b-42: nam mkha' las byung mtshan med phyir //
T02D1630:239a-1: med pa'i mchog / sems dpa'i rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02D1630:239a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sgrubs shig / dngos grub
T02D1630:239a-3: chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po
T02D1630:239a-4: lhag pa'i lha // rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02D1630:239a-5: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag sgrubs shig / nyes pa med la rtag pa ste //
T02D1630:239a-6: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes su chags //
T02D1630:239a-7: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02D1630:239a-8: bcom ldan de nyid bdag sgrubs shig / shin tu
T02D1630:239a-9: dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas grol bde
T02D1630:239a-10: bzhin gshegs // kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1630:239a-11: byang chub sems su bdag sgrubs shig /
T02D1630:239a-12: dngos grub chen po mchog gi mchog / dbang bskur chen po rgyal bas rgyal //
T02D1630:239a-13: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa //
T02D1630:239a-14: rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag po'i bdag / sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa //
T02D1630:239a-15: sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02D1630:239a-16: sems can kun gyi yab nyid de //

T02D1630:239a-47: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D1630:239b-0: @239b de nas aom sarbba yo ga tsitta autp'a da y'a mi /

T02D1630:239b-8: 'gro gzhan dge ba gang bgyis pa //

T02D1630:239b-10: byang chub tu ni bdag gis bsngo //
T02D1630:239b-11: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //

T02D1630:239b-13: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bcad pa dang //
T02D1630:239b-14: dge ba rnams ni spel ba'i phyir //
T02D1630:239b-15: byang chub sems gnyis bskyed nas su //

T02D1630:239b-20: aom su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho /
T02D1630:239b-21: siddhi badzra ya th'a su kham /
T02D1630:239b-24: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo
T02D1630:239b-25: rje ye shes kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur gyis
T02D1630:239b-26: // gsang chen dam pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa

T02D1630:239b-31: du bcug la / de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs te /
T02D1630:239b-32: ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1630:239b-33: kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na dngos grub
T02D1630:239b-35: de lta bu'i ye shes nga yis bskyed par bya yis ;
T02D1630:239b-36: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste /
T02D1630:239b-37: khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /

T02D1630:239b-41: slar yang rdo rje snying gar gzhag / aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D1630:239b-42: snying la de ring yang dag zhugs //
T02D1630:239b-43: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //

T02D1630:240a-0: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng @240a * //

T02D1630:240a-4: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //

T02D1630:240a-6: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //

T02D1630:240a-32: sku babs na na mkha' la gnas so //
T02D1630:240a-33: aom tishtha badzra zhes pas babs pa brtan par bya'o //
T02D1630:240a-35: de nas slob mas mandala byas te /
T02D1630:240a-36: me tog bkram la lha dang bla ma la yon phul nas /
T02D1630:240a-37: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
T02D1630:240a-38: zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba btab po //

T02D1630:240a-42: lha yi rigs kyi rim pa bzhin //
T02D1630:240a-43: bsod nams gang yin de dag shog /'dis ni dngos grub gang 'grub dang //

T02D1630:240b-4: dkar po la sogs pa la gang mthong ba las gang 'grub pa'i ltas brtag go //
T02D1630:240b-5: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la sngar smos
T02D1630:240b-6: pa'i bstod pas bstod la me tog dor bar bya

T02D1630:240b-15: rin chen me tog la sogs pa'i //

T02D1630:240b-17: gtso bo rigs de bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1630:240b-18: dngos grub 'gyur te the tshom med //

T02D1630:240b-29: de ni khyod kyi lha yin no //
T02D1630:240b-32: sgo srung nas yar rim pas gtso bo'i bar du
T02D1630:240b-33: ming brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas bstan par bya
T02D1630:240b-37: dbang bskur nas ni de nyid bstan //

T02D1630:240b-39: rdo rje 'dzin pas de skad gsungs //

T02D1630:240b-41: pa'i yon bla ma la phul nas gsol ba btab

T02D1630:240b-43: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du snying po'i
T02D1630:240b-44: dkyil 'khor phyed tsam gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa
T02D1630:240b-45: la dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar
T02D1630:240b-46: dang bcas pa lho ru lha mo bzhi'i mtshan ma
T02D1630:240b-47: spangs la der slob ma bzhag ste shis pa'i cho

T02D1630:241a-3: pa gnyis su bskor nas kham phor gyi me'i nang
T02D1630:241a-4: du blugs so // de bzhin du lan gsum du bya'o //
T02D1630:241a-5: de yang rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsrungs la nye re ga byas te /
T02D1630:241a-6: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis btab pa'i dri snying gar /
T02D1630:241a-10: sa rdzar sa bsregs pa'i bdug pas bdugs te shis pa'i cho ga bya'o //

T02D1630:241a-12: steng du bla re g-yas phyogs su h'um bzlas pa'i
T02D1630:241a-13: gdugs dkar po gser gyi yu ba can bzung ngo
T02D1630:241a-17: dung gis bud pa la sogs pa rol mo'i sgras nam mkha' gang bar bsams la /
T02D1630:241a-18: rdo rje dang dril bu dkrol te /
T02D1630:241a-19: phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra //
T02D1630:241a-20: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa //
T02D1630:241a-21: sangs rgyas padma rgyas pa 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba //
T02D1630:241a-22: de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis dang po yin //
T02D1630:241a-23: de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g-yo ba //
T02D1630:241a-24: 'jig rten gsum du grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa //
T02D1630:241a-25: chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa ;
T02D1630:241a-26: / de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa yin //
T02D1630:241a-27: dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis
T02D1630:241a-28: phyug / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi
T02D1630:241a-29: sbyin pa'i gnas // tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi //

T02D1630:241a-34: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D1630:241a-35: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o //

T02D1630:241a-38: dang por rnam rgyal gyi bum pa'i chus gtor //
T02D1630:241a-39: de nas lha mo rnams kyi bum pas so //
T02D1630:241a-40: de nas nang gi dbang bskur te /
T02D1630:241a-41: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo nam mkha' la bkug la /
T02D1630:241a-42: thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyis //
T02D1630:241b-0: 'di la dbang bskur rab tu @241b gsol //
T02D1630:241b-1: zhes yid kyis dbang bskur nas /
T02D1630:241b-2: de dag rang gi 'od las byung ba'i dbang bskur bar bsams la /
T02D1630:241b-3: sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyi //
T02D1630:241b-4: gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi //
T02D1630:241b-5: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D1630:241b-6: dbang bskur gnang ba chen po sbyin //
T02D1630:241b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs dang bcas pa de dag slob ma'i bu gar btsud de /
T02D1630:241b-10: lus thams cad la de'i rang bzhin du byas nas
T02D1630:241b-11: mi bskyod pa'i cod pan gyi sbyor bas gnas par
T02D1630:241b-12: bsams te / mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin gyi chu'i dbang ngo //
T02D1630:241b-13: de nas gser la sogs pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin las byas pa'am /
T02D1630:241b-14: ma 'byor na dar dang ras la sogs pa'i cod pan bcings la /
T02D1630:241b-15: nam mkha' gang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1630:241b-16: rin chen dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis der bzhugs par
T02D1630:241b-17: bsams te / bdag po'i rtags kyis mtshan pa yi //
T02D1630:241b-18: rtags kyi dam pa cod pan gyis //

T02D1630:241b-20: 'gro ba'i mgon skyabs byed par shog / aom ratna mu dra aa bhishinytsa zhes pas dbang bskur te /
T02D1630:241b-21: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang bzhin cod pan gyi dbang ngo //

T02D1630:241b-23: slob ma'i gnas gsum du gtugs la /
T02D1630:241b-24: sangs rgyas kyi ni rdo rje'i dbang //
T02D1630:241b-25: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D1630:241b-26: de ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02D1630:241b-27: rab bsgrub phyir ni rdo rje gzung //
T02D1630:241b-29: zhes pas lag pa g-yas su rdo rje byin te /
T02D1630:241b-30: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i dbang ngo //

T02D1630:241b-32: shes rab dril bu'i dbang bskur ba //
T02D1630:241b-33: de ring khyod la sbyin par bya //
T02D1630:241b-34: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02D1630:241b-35: shes rab chos kyi dbyings zhes gsungs //

T02D1630:242a-6: 'di ni rtag pa'i rang bzhin gyi ming gi dbang ngo //

T02D1630:242a-18: de nas slob dpon gyi dbang bskur te /

T02D1630:242a-20: rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba //
T02D1630:242a-21: thugs rje can khyod bka' drin gyis //

T02D1630:242a-23: zhes gsol ba btab pa dang /

T02D1630:242a-35: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma

T02D1630:242a-47: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D1630:242a-48: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //

T02D1630:242a-50: srid pa rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir //

T02D1630:242b-2: aom badzra ghande ra ni ta pra ra ni ta /
T02D1630:242b-3: sam pra ra ni ta sarba buddha kshe tra pra
T02D1630:242b-4: tsa li te pradznya p'a ra mi t'a n'a da
T02D1630:242b-5: sva bh'a we badzra dha ra hri da ya aa
T02D1630:242b-6: pra ti ha ta so sh'a na h'um h'um h'um
T02D1630:242b-7: phat sv'a h'a / zhes pas dkrol bar bya ste dril bu'i brtul zhugs so //
T02D1630:242b-8: de nas phyag rgya'i brtul zhugs sbyin te /
T02D1630:242b-9: de la shes rab lo grangs bcu gnyis kun du 'khyud byas te /
T02D1630:242b-10: rdo rje dril bu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1630:242b-11: slob dpon gyi ni dbang du 'dod //
T02D1630:242b-13: de bas na rang gi lha'i phyag rgyar byin gyis brlab pa //
T02D1630:242b-15: yid kyi lus ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02D1630:242b-16: dam tshig phyag rgya rab tu grags //
T02D1630:242b-17: rang gi lus kun brtan byed pa //
T02D1630:242b-18: de ni phyag rgyar rab tu grags //
T02D1630:242b-19: zhes pas rang gi lha'i mngon par rtogs pa bskyed de /
T02D1630:242b-20: me tog la sogs pas kun nas mchod cing bstod pa bya ste /
T02D1630:242b-21: de yang snyems pa dang bcas pas /
T02D1630:242b-22: me tog gcig slob ma'i mgo la dor la /
T02D1630:242b-23: deng nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1630:242b-24: sras dang bcas pa rnam rol cing //
T02D1630:242b-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1630:242b-26: dga' ston bde ba'i mchod pa gyis //
T02D1630:242b-28: sgeg dang bcas pas phreng ba 'phang //
T02D1630:242b-29: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya //
T02D1630:242b-31: phreng ba de yi rgyan yin no //
T02D1630:242b-33: lus can rnams la dam chos kyi //
T02D1630:242b-34: khyod kyis glu ni blang bar bya //
T02D1630:242b-35: de yis bde gshegs dngos grub ni //
T02D1630:242b-36: myur du bde ba myong bar 'gyur /
T02D1630:242b-38: hr'i:/ de nyid thal mo'i gar gyis ni //
T02D1630:242b-39: sangs rgyas thams cad chags par byos //
T02D1630:242b-40: sangs rgyas 'du ba'i phrin las kyis //
T02D1630:242b-41: gar mkhan tshul du bsgyur bar gyis //
T02D1630:242b-43: rdzogs sangs rgyas la spos phul bas //
T02D1630:242b-44: brtul zhugs bzang pos legs tshim gyis //
T02D1630:242b-45: lus can bde gshegs cha lugs su //
T02D1630:242b-46: ye shes kyis ni tshim par gyis //
T02D1630:242b-48: sangs rgyas rnams la me tog gtor //
T02D1630:242b-49: byang chub yan lag tshogs 'gyur bas //
T02D1630:242b-50: mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa yi //
T02D1630:242b-51: bde gshegs sku ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D1630:242b-53: chos kyi me ni legs sbar bas //
T02D1630:242b-54: rdo rje chos dang 'dra ba ru //
T02D1630:243a-2: ye shes sgron mas 'bar bar gyis //
T02D1630:243a-4: rgyal ba rnams la dri phul bas //
T02D1630:243a-5: tshul khrims de bzhin shes rab dang //
T02D1630:243a-6: rnam grol ye shes mthong ba yi //
T02D1630:243a-7: byang chub lus can rnams la bsgos //
T02D1630:243a-9: de'i rjes la gser gyi thur ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te /
T02D1630:243a-10: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02D1630:243a-11: 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar //
T02D1630:243a-12: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02D1630:243a-13: ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02D1630:243a-14: aom badzra ne tra ya aa pa ha ra pa ta lam hr'i:/
T02D1630:243a-15: de nas me long bstan te /
T02D1630:243a-16: gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med //
T02D1630:243a-17: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D1630:243a-18: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02D1630:243a-19: rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa //
T02D1630:243a-20: de ltar chos rnams shes byas nas //
T02D1630:243a-21: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02D1630:243a-22: 'on kyang rgyal ba'i sras su skye //
T02D1630:243a-23: de nas ho zhes bya bas mda' gzhu byin la /
T02D1630:243a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rjes su chags par byos shig ces bsgo la //
T02D1630:243a-25: phyogs bzhir mda' re 'phang ba dang /
T02D1630:243a-26: 'og tu yang mda' 'phen du gzhug go //
T02D1630:243a-27: de nas badzra hi tu krum zhes bya bas 'khor
T02D1630:243a-28: lo rkang pa'i bar du gzhag / yang aom badzra
T02D1630:243a-29: bha sha ram zhes bya bas lag pa g-yas su
T02D1630:243a-30: dung gtad nas / g-yon par ma h'a m'a y'a'i pusti byin te dril bu yang dkrol zhing //
T02D1630:243a-31: deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa //
T02D1630:243a-32: gzhan gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02D1630:243a-33: khyod kyis the tshom dogs med par //
T02D1630:243a-34: yid gnyis med pa'i sems kyis su //
T02D1630:243a-35: chos kyi dung ni bla med pa //
T02D1630:243a-36: dri med kun du gang bar gyis//
T02D1630:243a-37: sngags spyod tshul gyis cho ga rnams //
T02D1630:243a-38: skye bo rnams la rtag tu shod //
T02D1630:243a-39: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02D1630:243a-40: phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02D1630:243a-41: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02D1630:243a-42: khyod la rtag tu bsrung bar mdzad //
T02D1630:243a-44: de nas so so'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha lugs su byas te ;
T02D1630:243a-45: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D1630:243a-46: 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du //
T02D1630:243a-47: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D1630:243a-48: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D1630:243a-49: de bzhin du chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang /
T02D1630:243b-0: las kyi tshig bcug la tshigs su bcad pa @243b
T02D1630:243b-1: lngas rjes su gnang ba byin la de nas yang
T02D1630:243b-2: / zhi rgyas dbang dang gsad pa dang //
T02D1630:243b-3: dgug bsgral bcing dang bskrad pa dang //
T02D1630:243b-4: dbye dang gnas pa la sogs pa'i //
T02D1630:243b-5: las de thams cad 'grub par gyis //
T02D1630:243b-6: ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang //
T02D1630:243b-7: mchil lha ma de bzhin ril bu ste //
T02D1630:243b-8: rnal 'byor ma yis dngos grub rnams //
T02D1630:243b-9: de dag cing gar bsgrub par gyis //
T02D1630:243b-10: zhes bya bas rjes su gnang ba'o //
T02D1630:243b-11: de nas bdag nyid langs te /
T02D1630:243b-12: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su dmigs nas g-yon pas snying gar chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02D1630:243b-13: g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ltar byas te ;
T02D1630:243b-14: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas lung bstan te /
T02D1630:243b-15: aom 'dir ni khyod la ngas lung bstan //
T02D1630:243b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1630:243b-17: srid pa shin tu dag pas na //
T02D1630:243b-18: srid pa'i ngan 'gro dag las bton //
T02D1630:243b-19: he badzra n'a ma ta th'a ga ta bhurbhu wa
T02D1630:243b-20: sva:gang tshul 'di dang phyag rgya chen po mchog tu
T02D1630:243b-21: gsang ba'i cho ga 'dis lung bstan pa de la
T02D1630:243b-22: / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dkyil 'khor
T02D1630:243b-23: gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa rnams mgrin gcig tu
T02D1630:243b-24: bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por lung ston
T02D1630:243b-25: / par mdzad de / sngags 'di dang phyag rgya
T02D1630:243b-26: 'di'i mthu yin no zhes bya bas dad pa bskyed
T02D1630:243b-27: / par mdzad de / pa'o // de nas gsang ba bsgrags te /
T02D1630:243b-28: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig / khams gsum na ni gzhan med de //
T02D1630:243b-29: de bas 'dod la chags bral bar //
T02D1630:243b-30: nam yang bya ba ma yin no //
T02D1630:243b-31: ma h'a m'a y'a ha na h'um de nas slob ma'i spyi bor gdugs bzung la /
T02D1630:243b-32: gdugs dang bcas par bskor ba bya ste /
T02D1630:243b-33: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi drung du gdugs dang bcas pas spyi bor gtugs la /
T02D1630:243b-34: sngags rnams 'dzin par gyur pa yi //
T02D1630:243b-35: slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags /
T02D1630:243b-36: zhes brjod la gdugs bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D1630:243b-38: sngags dang rgyud rnams 'dzin gyur par //
T02D1630:243b-39: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D1630:243b-40: lha rnams kun gyis mthun par gsungs //
T02D1630:243b-41: sems can kun la rjes brtse bas //
T02D1630:243b-42: dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bris //
T02D1630:243b-43: khyod kyis nan tan bskyed nas su //
T02D1630:243b-44: sgrub pa po rnams sngags la sbyor //
T02D1630:244a-2: zhugs pa dang ni mthong ba yis //
T02D1630:244a-3: sdig pa kun las rnam grol te //
T02D1630:244a-4: de ring khyod ni dge bar gnas //
T02D1630:244a-5: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02D1630:244a-6: phyin chad 'chi ba yong min te //
T02D1630:244a-7: mi thub gnod pa yong min pas //
T02D1630:244a-8: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis ;
T02D1630:244a-9: ; srid pa shin tu dag pas na //
T02D1630:244a-10: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las 'das so //
T02D1630:244a-11: rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya dang //
T02D1630:244a-12: byang chub sems ni spang mi bya //
T02D1630:244a-13: gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D1630:244a-14: sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med //
T02D1630:244a-15: dam pa'i chos kyang smad mi bya //
T02D1630:244a-16: nam yang dor bar yod mi bya //
T02D1630:244a-17: mi shes pa'am rmongs pa la //
T02D1630:244a-18: de nyid bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D1630:244a-19: rdo rje dril bu mi spang zhing //
T02D1630:244a-20: slob dpon nam yang smad mi bya //
T02D1630:244a-21: sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs pas na //
T02D1630:244a-22: de la smod byed gang yin pa //
T02D1630:244a-23: des ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob //
T02D1630:244a-24: rang bdag yongs su spangs nas su//
T02D1630:244a-25: dka' thub kyis ni gdung mi bya //
T02D1630:244a-26: ji ltar bde bar bder gnas nas //
T02D1630:244a-28: khyod ni de ring 'bras bu yod //
T02D1630:244a-29: lha dang dam tshig mnyam 'gyur te //
T02D1630:244a-30: rdo rje sems dpa' dang mtshungs par //
T02D1630:244a-31: rtag tu khyod rnams grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1630:244a-33: de nas slob mas phyag byas te //
T02D1630:244a-34: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa //
T02D1630:244a-35: de dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi //
T02D1630:244a-37: 'di ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1630:244a-38: de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur te sa phyogs dben par bya ste /
T02D1630:244a-40: / rgyud nas gsungs pa'i lo bcu gnyis ma la
T02D1630:244a-41: sogs pa'i dam tshig can bla ma la phul la
T02D1630:244a-43: byang chub zhi ba dga' ba che //
T02D1630:244a-44: rdo rje sbyor bas yang dag byung //
T02D1630:244a-45: mi phyed phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrub //
T02D1630:244a-46: rdo rje sbyor ba ci la gus //
T02D1630:244a-47: bdag nyid chen po khyod ji bzhin//
T02D1630:244a-48: gtso bos bdag ni mdzad du gsol //
T02D1630:244a-50: bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyob //
T02D1630:244a-51: ces gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02D1630:244a-52: de nas dpal ldan slob dpon ni //
T02D1630:244a-53: rjes su brtse dang ldan pa yis //
T02D1630:244a-54: snying rje slob ma la bskyed de //
T02D1630:244a-55: rdo rje 'dzin par mdzad pa la //
T02D1630:244b-0: sha @244b chang bza' btung yid du 'ong //
T02D1630:244b-1: me tog bdug spos dri la sogs //
T02D1630:244b-2: rgyal mtshan dril bur bcas pa yis //
T02D1630:244b-3: slob mas rdo rje can la mchod //
T02D1630:244b-4: de nas phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1630:244b-5: phyag rgya khu ba dang ldan pa de srid du
T02D1630:244b-6: bsten la snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba ste
T02D1630:244b-7: // slob ma dang phyag rgya gnyis mig bkab la /
T02D1630:244b-8: slob ma la dbang bskur te /
T02D1630:244b-9: ji ltar bde gshegs thub chen gyis //
T02D1630:244b-10: byang chub sras la dbang bskur ltar //
T02D1630:244b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur bas //
T02D1630:244b-12: bdag gi sems rgyud 'di yis bkru //
T02D1630:244b-13: bo dhi tsitta aa bhi shinytsa //
T02D1630:244b-14: zhes brjod la slob mas kyang /
T02D1630:244b-15: aa ho su kha zhes brjod do //
T02D1630:244b-16: bde ba rdzogs par gzhug go //
T02D1630:244b-17: shes rab kyis kyang de ltar bya ste //
T02D1630:244b-18: thabs dang shes rab kyi gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1630:244b-19: de'i rjes la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur te /
T02D1630:244b-20: slob mas snga ma ltar gsol ba btab nas /
T02D1630:244b-21: mtshan dang ldan pa'i shes rab ma byin gyis brlabs te gtad la /
T02D1630:244b-22: mgo bor lag pa bzhag ste /
T02D1630:244b-23: dga' ster gnas te bu mo 'di //
T02D1630:244b-24: sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'ong ba //
T02D1630:244b-25: zung shig zung shig sems dpa' che //
T02D1630:244b-26: bzung nas mchod pa rab tu bya //
T02D1630:244b-27: thabs gzhan gyis ni 'tshang mi rgya //
T02D1630:244b-28: 'gro ba gsum po 'di yis dag / de bas khyod kyis nam yang ni //
T02D1630:244b-29: 'di dang bral bar mi bya ste //
T02D1630:244b-30: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1630:244b-31: rig ma'i brtul zhugs bla na med //
T02D1630:244b-32: blun po gang zhig 'di spang ba //
T02D1630:244b-33: de la mchog gi dngos grub med //
T02D1630:244b-36: bshang gci khrag dang khu ba dang //
T02D1630:244b-37: sha chen la sogs bza' ba dang //
T02D1630:244b-38: bud med rnams la rtag gus dang //
T02D1630:244b-40: bu khyod spro bar byed nus sam //
T02D1630:244b-43: lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro //
T02D1630:244b-44: khu khrag la sogs bza' ba dang //
T02D1630:244b-45: bud med rnams la rtag gus shing //
T02D1630:244b-50: bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1630:244b-51: bde chen phyag rgya chen po ni //
T02D1630:244b-52: 'di nyid du ni rtag tu gnas //
T02D1630:245a-0: @245a * // blun po gang zhig 'di spong ba //
T02D1630:245a-1: de la mchog gi dngos grub med //
T02D1630:245a-3: de'i rdzas la ji skad du bshad pa'i ka ra na byas la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02D1630:245a-4: man ngag gis de'i skad cig mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1630:245a-5: dbang bzhi pa bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
T02D1630:245a-6: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub gzhung la //
T02D1630:245a-7: dad cing 'jug par bya ba'i phyir //
